data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea obovata (Sibirean spruce) from sample KOTUYPCO-72

Exposition S, Slope 30 deg, Geology: Kalk-Blockschutt, Rendzin, av. Tree height 10 m, Tree cover 40%, Shrub cover 20%, Herb cover 60%, Moss cover 70%, Vegatation type: Blockschutt Fi-Wald, Film number: 881A
